message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to offer you this amazing product. I think it's a great fit for you, and I'm willing to make a deal. I'm offering it to you for $110.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $90. Can you meet me at that price?
I understand you're looking for a better deal, Bob. I'm willing to meet you halfway. I'm counteroffering at $105. It's the lowest I can go, but I think it's still a great value for the product.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I was thinking more like $95. Can you consider that?
I understand you're still looking for a better deal, Bob. I'm willing to make one more concession. I'm counteroffering at $102. This is as low as I can go without losing money on the deal.
I appreciate your willingness to make concessions, but I'm still a bit short of my target. Can you meet me at $98?
I'm getting close to my minimum price, Bob. I'm willing to make one more concession. I'm counteroffering at $100. This is as low as I can go without losing money on the deal.
I understand you're at your lowest price, Alice. I'm willing to meet you at $99, but that's as high as I'm willing to go. Can you accept that?
I've already said I'm at my lowest price, Bob. I'm not willing to go any lower. I think we're at an impasse. I'm going to have to consider other options.
